sense.gloss: to operate (e.g. a machine), to handle, to manage, to control, to maneuver, to steer
to have a good command of (a language), to play proficiently (of a musical instrument)
to work (a puppet), to pull the strings of a puppet
to manipulate (a person, public opinion, etc.), to pull the strings, to control from the shadows, to mastermind

sdata.j: あの↑通訳↑↓つうやく↓は５か↑国↑↓こく↓↑語↑↓ご↓を↑自由↑↓じゆう↓に↑操↑↓|あやつ↓る|。
sdata.e: That interpreter is a master of five languages.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は、↑数字↑↓すうじ↓を↑操↑↓|あやつ↓る|のがへたです。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑英語↑↓えいご↓↑以外↑↓いがい↓にも↑２↑↓ふた↓つの↑言語↑↓げんご↓を↑自由↑↓じゆう↓に|あやつる|。
sdata.e: He has two languages at his command besides English.

sdata.j: ↑光速↑↓こうそく↓の↑異名↑↓いみょう↓を↑持↑↓も↓ち↑重力↑↓じゅうりょく↓を↑自在↑↓じざい↓に↑操↑↓|あやつ↓る|↑高貴↑↓こうき↓なる↑女性↑↓じょせい↓↑騎士↑↓きし↓が↑登場↑↓とうじょう↓するゲームをしたい。
sdata.e: I want to play a game where a noble female knight with the nickname "Light-Speed" freely manipulates gravity.

sdata.j: ただ↑今↑↓こん↓↑限定↑↓げんてい↓20↑名↑↓めい↓↑様↑↓さま↓にだけ、↑年下↑↓としした↓↑女↑↓おんな↓を↑操↑↓|あやつ↓る|↑秘密↑↓ひみつ↓を↑無料↑↓むりょう↓で↑公開↑↓こうかい↓しております。
sdata.e: Right now, to 20 people only, we're revealing for free the secret of manipulating younger women.

sdata.j: トムは↑他人↑↓たにん↓を↑操↑↓|あやつ↓る|↑癖↑↓くせ↓のある↑者↑↓もの↓が↑気↑↓き↓に↑食↑↓く↓わない。
sdata.e: Tom doesn't like people who manipulate others.
